#summary User Group for pchart4mw

To share experience with the use of pchart4mw or to discuss it you can use the user group site for pchart4mw. 

Please use the google group for:
 * Feedback<br> We'd love to learn, how you like this extension, in what context you use it (maybe share your link).
 * Share your custom made [ColorSchemes colorschemes]
 * Tips and tricks 
 * Discussion
 * etc...

===Reference===
February 5<sup>th</sup> 2010: Due to inappropriate spam in the user group we decided to delete the pchart4mw user group (google group). We will look for an other solution. Sorry for the inconvenience.
In the mean time please use the talk page of http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Pchart4mw
